section.4: Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Detailed Rules of Law about the Prayer during Journey

hadiths.text: The above mentioned tradition has also been narrated through a different chain of transmitters by 'Abd Allah b. Abi 'Ammar who narrated it in like manner. Abu Dawud said:This has been transmitted by Abu 'Asim and Hammad b. Mas'adah as transmitted by Ibn Bakr
